title: Cloud over the coral reef
creator_credit: Moonlight Productions, Lee Tepley and R.E. Johannes
brief_description: This film considers the effect of sewage pollution and sedimentation on the coral reefs of the tropics and also examines a severe ecological disturbance of unknown origin - the population explosion of the coral eating Crown of Thorns starfish, which may be caused by pollution or some other form of man’s activity.
creator_credit_for_label: Moonlight Productions, Lee Tepley and R.E. Johannes
